title: Bor
explanationEnUs: Use -ing adjectives to describe the thing causing the feeling.
explanationZhTw: -ing 形容詞用來形容引起感覺的事物。
explanationZhCn: -ing 形容词用来形容引起感觉的事物。

title: Shock
explanationEnUs: The news caused the shock, so use -ing.
explanationZhTw: 新聞引起了震驚，所以使用 -ing。
explanationZhCn: 新闻引起了震惊，所以使用 -ing。

title: Surpris
explanationEnUs: She felt the surprise, so use -ed.

title: Interest
explanationEnUs: He has the feeling of interest.

title: Good
explanationEnUs: 'Taste' is a linking verb, so it takes an adjective.
explanationZhTw: 'Taste' (嚐起來) 是連綴動詞，後接形容詞。
explanationZhCn: 'Taste' (尝起来) 是连系动词，后接形容词。

title: Happy
explanationEnUs: 'Look' is a linking verb here, describing the subject.
explanationZhTw: 'Look' (看起來) 是連綴動詞，形容主詞。
explanationZhCn: 'Look' (看起来) 是连系动词，形容主语。

title: Nice
explanationEnUs: 'Seem' is always followed by an adjective.
explanationZhTw: 'Seem' (似乎) 後面總是接形容詞。
explanationZhCn: 'Seem' (似乎) 后面总是接形容词。

title: Widespread
explanationEnUs: Use an adjective to modify a noun (belief).

title: Fast
explanationEnUs: 'Fast' is an adjective here. 'Fastly' is not a word.
explanationZhTw: 'Fast' 在此是形容詞。'Fastly' 不是一個字。
explanationZhCn: 'Fast' 在此是形容词。'Fastly' 不是一个字。
